channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson says she's 'shocked, angered and in disbelief' over Sam Altman using a copycat voice for his new ChatGPT bot
item.description: OpenAI said it is “working to pause” Sky — the name of one of five voices that ChatGPT users can chose to speak with.

item.title: Sustainability Reporting: Navigating Assurance Practices
item.description: Don't be lulled into a false sense of security by the word "assurance" when evaluating sustainability reports. Assurance practices vary, and investors would be wise to learn more about the different levels of coverage.

item.title: Biden and Trump united on heavy import tariffs as election approaches
item.description: Trump and Biden agree on essentially nothing else, from taxes and climate change to immigration and regulation.

item.title: The Power of Clicks, Likes, and Shares: Promote the Right Kind of Financial Content
item.description: Not all financial content creators on social media are created equal. A broad differentiation can be made between influencers, knowledge sharers, and aspiring thought leaders.

item.title: Gen Zers walk into the workplace with one foot out the door—slandering them won’t solve the future-of-work conundrum
item.description: In a society where possibilities are endless, it shouldn’t come as a shock that there is an appeal in betting on yourself if your values are being ignored.

item.title: Why the New T+1 Settlement Cycle Matters: A Global Index Provider’s Perspective
item.description: Shorter settlement periods are meant to protect market participants. But the new T+1 settlement cycle for US equities may have undesirable knock-on effects for financial market participants around the world, including index fund managers.

item.title: Trump’s Truth Social company lost more than $300 million in its first quarter as a public company
item.description: At this early stage in the Company’s development, TMTG remains focused on long-term product development, rather than quarterly revenue,” Trump Media said.

item.title: Leveraging AI to Identify and Predict Financial Crises
item.description: Despite some current limitations, AI stands to offer significant advantages versus traditional approaches to identifying and predicting financial crises.

item.title: Drone pilots don't have First Amendment right to offer mapping services
item.description: The panel of the 4th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals, in upholding a trial court’s decision, found the free-speech protections of Michael Jones and his 360 Virtual Drone Services business weren't violated.
